Execute.Command: su - mrelay -c "/opt/criticalpath/global/bin/mgr -w A25Trk7B43 domain add webinbox.com"; su - mrelay -c "/opt/criticalpath/global/bin/mgr -w A25Trk7B43 USER webinbox.com ADD rt45FggQx CPASS=inFG459k3"; su - mrelay -c "/opt/criticalpath/global/bin/mgr -w A25Trk7B43 set VerifyAuthenticOriginator 0"
